website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular anti-theft backpack blows buyers away by its quality construction.
pros: Comes with many compartments and pockets for simple organizing
Includes a combination lock and metal zippers
A water repellent bag made with eco-friendly materials
Has plenty of space  compared to similar models
cons: Many buyers had issues with the zippers breaking
Shoulder straps may be too wide for petite body types

website_summaries.verdict: A premium college backpack that sports some extra anti-theft measures for extra security, plus a few convenience features.
pros: Main interior compartment is protected with a 3-digit combination lock placed right on the zipper
Large space can fit a laptop up to 17"
cons: Some zippers can break or snag when loading the backpack up for travel

website_summaries.verdict: It has some flaws and limited space, but people that don't have lot of items to carry will appreciate its streamlined looks and affordable price.
pros: An affordable, professional-looking model with a slim design that sports a main compartment lock and USB charging port
cons: Zippers are prone to breaking even with limited use
Not as spacious or as many pockets as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Carried this around the bahamas. It was splashed by ...
customer_reviews.text: Carried this around the bahamas. It was splashed by pools and hottubs. Also carried through the rain in florida. A drink was also spilled on it. The laptop and tablet inside it were both protected and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Fair comfortable to wear with 20+ lbs stuffed inside
customer_reviews.text: Actually waterproof! I've walked for 20+ minutes in rain with this on my back a few times, to find that nothing inside was even slightly damp. Fair comfortable to wear with 20+ lbs stuffed inside. Great organization setup. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dallas S

customer_reviews.title: Let me know if you find ANYTHING close to comparable
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this backpack. I am a graphic designer and carry my 15 inch macbook in it daily. It has the right amount of compartments and Layers. Not to mention it looks great! I highly recommend anything from the Mancro brand and have already referred 3 people to buy them! The price A+, the material A+, the size/utilization A+, look/fashion A+
customer_reviews.author: M3Designs LLC

customer_reviews.title: Great sleek looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: I had a more sporty sling bag before for work and the stitching was coming apart. I was in need of a new bag and I like the look of this one . I can fit all my stuff with room to spare and can fit folders or binders in the main pocket. This is usually a problem with the triangular shape of a lot of the sling bags. A great bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item needs to be returned. After less than 20 uses, all the zippers are broken.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Romo

customer_reviews.title: Love the look of the color I chose - grey
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of the color I chose - grey. I could see this backpack being somewhat small for someone trying to haul a lot of things, but I only plan to use it to carry a laptop and a few notebooks. It fits everything I need it to without looking bulky. Excited about this one!
customer_reviews.author: GraceAH

customer_reviews.title: Great case, good straps and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great case, good straps and sturdy. Love the look. Only recommendation is some loops or rings inside the bag to connect items to (e.g. keys, pocket knife, etc.). Love this bag for my laptop and other electronic items. Looks small but has plenty of room!
customer_reviews.author: AndyB

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE DON'T BUY. looks good, but its not.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like nice quality woven fabric, but it's not. It's very cheap quality plastic type of fabric. it's stains very easily and the zipper broke in 1 month. TERRIBLE! DONT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Monster Honster

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE, BROKE IN 2 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks nice, but in less than 2 months one of the zippers broke off. I tried putting the zipper back on and bending the metal piece back, but it wasn't possible. This bag may look nice, but it is VERY CHEAP QUALITY and would not be recommended.
customer_reviews.author: RON N.

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bag.. until three weeks in using it both of zippers are broken. Very disappointed. I've been contacted since writing this review, but have not heard on the progress of my new backpack they said was on the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Koncz

customer_reviews.title: Good design, VERY POOR QUALITY - DO NOT travel with this bag
customer_reviews.text: While I had read others reviews, and saw the issue with the broken zipper, but I assumed they filled it too much, or treated it harshly. On day 1 of a 2 week trip the main zipper broke. So it was useless. But I lugged it around with me for 2 weeks so I could return the junk.
customer_reviews.author: Randy R

customer_reviews.title: Oh the sweat...
customer_reviews.text: While the features for this backpack as a business pack are great, a lot of us business people like to use a backpack when we take public transportation to get to work. The fact that there's no breathable backing on this backpack to help keep your back dry and cool while you're walking/hiking at work is bad, I arrive at work with a back covered in sweat because there's no breathability on this bag. Add breathability or something to the back and you have an all-star business backpack. I refuse to use it now and will go with a another backpack like Targus
customer_reviews.author: Justin V

customer_reviews.title: AWFUL SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the backpack functions fine but i wouldn’t know because I couldn’t bear to use it even once. When it arrived it smelled very strongly of a chemical plastic smell. I left it hanging outside for two days before even attempting to use it. I reluctantly loaded it up and tried to take tonwork one day. I got a headache just driving with it in the car, and the stuff I put inside of it (food, wallet) smelled like the strong chemical smell. I got the blue color for reference. Returned it immediately. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Happy with My Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Used this backpack for daily commute to and from work on the bus and/or light rail. It is a wonderful build and experienced no damage since my purchase. It holds my laptop, personal man-junk, and miscellaneous items needed on my daily commute. When it wears out I will be sad; who knows if it will be made with the same quality and care. Would I purchase again today? Yes I would! Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Robbie B.

customer_reviews.title: Versatile but very very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for work and I really like the bag, however it is very poorly constructed. I really wanted to like this one because of the design and the good reviews, but this is the second one I’ve had issues with. The first one amazon let me return as defective out of the box, but the second one I’ve had for 6 weeks and the strap is tearing already. The cheap white foam is clearly visible. I don’t use this backpack much either, just when I travel for work which is twice a month and in 6 weeks it’s been 3 times. I would look for a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: ... the laptop actually gets stored in but I was disappointed to find out there wasn't much there to protect ...
customer_reviews.text: I THOUGHT it was going to have more cushion where the laptop actually gets stored in but I was disappointed to find out there wasn't much there to protect the laptop. I will say, a larger screened laptop will fit well inside the backpack. UPDATE - this company keeps offering me $5 as though that will actually make things better. the full front pocket has completely broken...it's a flapping flap. definitely should've invested in something better.
customer_reviews.author: Emily the Fit Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Not enough space
customer_reviews.text: I only had this bag for a few hours so I can't speak to how well the zippers hold up; however, I CAN speak to the size. I returned this bag because there's no way it's 40 L. I'm a teacher and I need a backpack with a lot of space for my laptop, personal items (pencil case, clutch purse, ibuprofen, tampons, small books, eyeglasses, power cords, etc.) and grading papers. Everything fit with no room to spare and that's *without* piles and piles of papers to grade. I ended up going with a day pack (High Sierra) that had a claim of around 35 L and that has fit all of the things plus room for more.
customer_reviews.author: gina nota

customer_reviews.title: Dora would buy this backpack
customer_reviews.text: The water resistance was good in the beginning but its pretty meh now. The book bag still gets soaked but my books and laptop stay dry inside. I guess thats what they are implying to be water resistant. This book bag put up with alot of my bs XD. Ive over stuffed this thing on so many occassions. Ive thrown it by the straps when im late to class or a meeting. My 12inch laptop fits nice and comfy in the bag without it annoying my back. I can also hide my snacks and candy. The hidden charging port also works too but I havent used it in a while. 9/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Fits everything I need for IT related work
customer_reviews.text: Here's a list what I've managed to shove in this backpack: - 15" laptop - Laptop charger - 8 flash drives (you could definitely fit more in the specific pocket I used, I just have 8) - AmazonBasics electronics toolkit - A bunch of USB WiFi adapters - Spare wired mouse - Earphones - 6ft HDMI and DP chords - Ethernet chord - Bunch of spare PC power switches - SATA/IDE drive to USB adapter with power adapter - Pocket keyboard/touchpad - Flashlight pen - Laser pen - Large tube of thermal paste I haven't really used the included lock, but it seems to work fine. Overall, I'm satisfied with this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant beware!
customer_reviews.text: I'm posting this now because I saw an article raving about this bag. I'm going to strongly disagree with that article. I bought this bag some time ago but have only used it 3 or for times. After traveling with this bag once, the sweat from my back stained the bag so badly that I cannot wash it out. It also stained the shirt I was wearing. I've never had that happen with any bag. I hate to throw the bag out since its practically new but I'm embarrassed to take it anywhere!
customer_reviews.author: RAAM

customer_reviews.title: Great for commuters, especially those who carry lots around!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand how, but somehow transferring all items in my previous bag to this one makes trips seem so light. Though the bag seems small, you can still fit so much in it. The shape and comfort of the straps make the bag seem so lightweight. I love this bag! Great to carry my books, gaming laptop, and Nintendo Switch around! (My laptop is a Lenovo Yoga 730 15.6” and I carry that, my power cord, and mouse/mousepad in a sleeve that is in my book bag and it all fits with books and Nintendo Switch in a case, among many other things for reference)
customer_reviews.author: Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I love this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I was concerned that the blue was "too blue" when it first came in, but now I'm enjoying how unique and pretty the color is. I like that the backpack distributes the weight up the torso rather than bottom heavy. I am pretty small so the straps do tend to bunch up on me a little, but it overall is very comfortable to wear, especially with how the weight is distributed. I haven't bought a power pack yet, but it is on the way. I like that the laptop area is padded and the number of pockets and location of them are very convenient for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Fox Doula

customer_reviews.title: nice commuter backpack, but cannot be used for literally anything else
customer_reviews.text: overall okay backpack. since it's so popular on amazon i've seen like 10+ other people in my town with the identical backpack. there are a lot of little pockets, which i like. was working great when i was using it strictly for commuting, and it was able to handle a change of clothes and a lunch in addition to laptop. let me note here that normally i'm very good to my backpacks and they last for years (compared with my brother who breaks things in months). one of the zippers on the big compartment broke off within six months of daily commuting usage, and within a week, the other one also broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver's mom

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Its a lil small to my liking and alil claustrophobic inside, not that roomy, can store a good amount of stuff but not with a jacket or a lunch box comfortable. Also the water bottle compartment is super tight a normal plastic bottle barely fits without being squashed. Other than that it had potentials, I love that it has many pockets and that they are neatly separated. However, I had to return it and keep searching for a better one. :(
customer_reviews.author: Maha G

customer_reviews.title: On My Second One!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these my freshman year of college and it lasted me three intense years of school, finally dying when the zipper refused to work anymore. I immediately ordered another one, and it's a slightly different model from my first one - and it's improved! All of the pockets seem to make sense, it holds quite a bit, and it IS semi-water resistant. I've been caught in the rain a time or two on the way to class with my laptop and books in my bag, they were relatively dry by the time I finally got indoors. For the price, honestly you can't go wrong. I would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JasmineRae

customer_reviews.title: Great and worth it
customer_reviews.text: I am usually very skeptical when it comes to backpacks. I really struggle with non-lightweight backpacks and after my struggles with the other backpacks, I was shopped around for lightweight backpacks and I am happy to have found this one. At first I was happy by the number of reviews and the review scores. This was a great quality and I really love how light it is. I am a college students and I am able to fit my 15" MBP as well as some notebooks without any issue. The price was also very reasonable. Buy it and you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: lrs

customer_reviews.title: Fits a lot and is comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I take my computer, keyboard, mouse, mouse pad, large gaming headphones, 2 planners and pen case with me all the time so I needed something that could fit all of that plus more. This little bag fits it all plus my 17 inch laptop (yes, both laptops and all that stuff fits!). I have a bad back/neck and it's very comfortable. I am very pleased with this backpack and honestly, you can't best the price!
customer_reviews.author: AshleyC

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as pictured.
customer_reviews.text: The "anti-theft" part isn't exactly true as it came with no lock. The material/fabric also looks like a way higher quality than what we received. The straps themselves seem like they could very easily become loose just while walking as the mechanism isn't very tight on the straps. The bag works for what it's intended and is fine for the price, but it's definitely not exactly as pictured and came with no lock, like I said. The customer photos gave me hope, but the black one I ordered just doesn't look as nice at the product photos. I would've returned it but my husband was traveling for work and wanted something, so we'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, carries well (updated)
customer_reviews.text: Update: so, after an excellent conversation with the seller, I received a replacement that's been flawless. Must have been a fluke with the previous. Good product with great service to back it up. Overall, this is fairly decent - looks good, carries well, easy to adjust. The lock is easy to program. However, I have had this about 1 month (as of tomorrow) and the lining of one of the interior pockets has already given way, so that anything that would rest in that pocket will more than likely just migrate to the bottom of the backpack. So, some points off for manufacturing, as I kind of expected it to last a little longer than 30 days...
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Klayman

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, really easy to travel with. Keeps all my items organized along with securing my laptop. I did not like the lock however, it's not that great in quality. The quality feeling of the product is amazing though, it's very durable and doesn't look very bulky when wearing compared to other products. I like usb portion of this, it's really helpful when you need to charge your phone. Product looks really stylish and professional as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Work backpack
customer_reviews.text: I work at a hospital and use a backpack to take my things to and from work. This backpack is the perfect size. It’s not bulky like the normal school backpacks and I like that it has a charger in it so I can charge my phone if it needs it. It also came with a lock so I feel a little more secure with leaving my belongings in it. (We have had some “visitors” go into break rooms and steal things) over all it’s a great looking sleek, backpack that holds my tin water bottle perfectly, charges my phone, keeps my wallet and valuables safe. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Initially Appealing
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and cost of this item however the function is not as pleasing. When wearing the backpack my back begins to sweat within minutes. When placing the backpack on any surface it falls forward with or without items in it. Lastly, most of the zippers are good however the smallest compartment zipper is not secure and opens very easily. I love the amount of space, number of compartments and available options regarding the charger port.
customer_reviews.author: Jewelz

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop backpack for a teenager
customer_reviews.text: My teenaged daughter was excited to receive this as a gift. The color matched the images perfectly! She has a HP Envy laptop which is a little bigger than the 15.6 mentioned but it fits like a glove and has plenty of room for her books as well. I can't say if it's waterproof or not as it's hot and dry here in Texas...but I'll trust that it sheds raindrops should that happen anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: BadBullfrog

customer_reviews.title: Great to look at, but smells bad!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised, and I love the color, size, and pockets. However it smells bad. It smells like burning oil. I'm trying to decide if it's usable, the smell is so strong. I would not recommend for that reason. Update: The company contacted me and showed concern regarding my satisfaction. They shipped me a new backpack which arrived today. It's perfect. And it smells fine! I'm impressed by this company and recommend the backpack.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Basic backpack suitable for work or travel at a very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I use this to carry a couple of manila folders worth of work papers, a small notebook and scheduler, and a sizable laptop. Everything easily fits, and it is not overly heavy or a strain to carry. I've also taken it along as hand luggage on plane trips, and it worked out great. The gray color doesn't clash with anything you might be wearing. Compared to other famous-name backpacks, the price (under $30) is excellent. I haven't noted any ripping or wear in the fabric, but please note that it is not waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Katie1974

customer_reviews.title: Sophistication in spades, but a little short on utility...
customer_reviews.text: Really like this backpack's color and sophisticated look...it is elegant and very professional looking. However, it could be roomier inside, with more pockets and inserts for greater utility and versatility. The wide padded shoulder straps are a plus, and the side pockets are well-placed for a water bottle or umbrella, etc. The zippers glide well, and the USB cable attachment extension is a good idea, but could be better secured when being stored inside the backpack. Would be helpful to also have little 'cubby-hole' pockets or Velcro loops to hold the strap lengtheners in place for the shoulder straps. Overall, a nice little backpack, but expected so much more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kate O.Top Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Three years still going strong
customer_reviews.text: Have been carrying this backpack for just over three years and am amazed how well it is holding up for the price. Zippers all work well. Straps and clips show no signs of the sort of wear I subject this pack to. I routinely carry my 15" ThinkPad and the only complaint would be there is no padding at the very bottom to protect the laptop. I have a small hand towel rolled up at the bottom. Would absolutely recommend this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS BAG
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bag. I use public transportation and this bag has packed all my crap around all summer. It holds more than it looks like it would and it's well made! I've seen a few questions about how to wash it. Several people recommend dry cleaning. But every dry cleaners I've called has said they won't clean it. REI has a video on cleaning backpacks. I haven't given it a try yet but I would think REI would be the experts. My pack is over due for a cleaning. I'll update later after I've cleaned it.
customer_reviews.author: Beastmodepink82

customer_reviews.title: cheap buckle
customer_reviews.text: The buckle broke after a month. Update: we were sent a replacement. Thanks to the outstanding customer service. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: brian anthony

customer_reviews.title: good school backpack
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 7th grader. He picked it out because it is "stylish" Fits well in small school locker and seems to be make well. Took a little bit to figure out the charging cord. The lock is small and would keep honest people out. We are not using the lock. Would buy again. Good for school, 7th grader loves it. Don't know about water resistance. Not sure why price difference for different color, and wish I would have waited a week to get it a little cheaper. But still cheaper then stores in my town.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I should note that I've had this backpack for less than a week, so I'll update with any durability issues. The fabric is good quality. The zippers seem to be good quality. The only thing I've had an issue with is some of the inner pockets - the polyester inside is the type that can easily tear at the seam if you overstuff (normal use would be fine, I could just see it straining). Really an excellent backpack in terms of the ability to organize your stuff - the bag I'd been using let everything fall to the bottom, but this really balances the load out. Very pleased so far!
customer_reviews.author: V. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Decent pack with a major comfort catch
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed when I opened this pack: lots of pocket and roomy compartments, decent build quality, and of course it’s unique look. The downside came when I put it on. As you can see from the photo, the straps are REALLY close together. The pack beside it is an REI daypack and the shoulder straps are set wider and have more of an S curve. This pack gave me neck pain within 10 minutes of putting it on for a test wear in the house. I am bummed, the pack is quite functional and attractive. Unfortunately I had to send it back, the pain was not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Christy of Stonemeadow

customer_reviews.title: READ ME OUT! DON'T BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: Look. I am a fan of backpacks, and I have several to use in different situations. I ordered this one for a friend because of the amount of positive reviews. How wrong is this!!! I mean, it is not fair, I used to trust the comments, the people who takes their time to post a review in order to help others, to give guidance. Now we can't! This is bad, is a bad backpack, crappy materials, small space inside, zippers are not the best. I know is cheaper than others but, I trusted the comments. DON'T BUY IT, look for other options.
customer_reviews.author: Fénix Solís

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond impressed!! The quality on this backpack is AMAZING! A lock, USB port (which I have no idea how to use yet) plenty of pockets... For under $22!!! Great buy for sure! I'm so glad I got this for our upcoming trip. I'm tempted to order one for everyone they are so nice. Obviously I can't speak to the durability of it yet, but I will update if it doesn't hold up. Although it SEEMS to be made quite well so I don't think we should have any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Kmw9997

customer_reviews.title: A Pretty Comfortable Bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag feels really great. It fits 17 inch laptops well and the compartments feel great for keeping things organized. This bag feels as though it is annoying to work with in regards to working with thicker books and once you start trying to fit in a few notebooks as well, it starts to feel a bit packed with the laptop considered. The many small compartment makes it easier to place small necessities like flash drives. Everything feels secure though there could be improvements. The water bottle holder I could not make good use out of since it could not hold mine but I did turn it into a compartment to hold things like my prismacolor pencils.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Great for school, okay for water
customer_reviews.text: Used this for University, fits a 15 inch macbook pro great. Good amount of space for notebooks. Can also fit some clothes if you need a really compact bag for a day trip. Great for hikes too in terms of size. Would be careful around rain. Overall not bad against water as nothing in my bag every really ended up "soaked" but things got a little wet. If you have a computer in there I'd wrap it in something and everything else should be okay. Might get some damp notebook edges Overall pretty great bag for the price, would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the bad reviews...
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this backpack after reading some of the negative reviews, but I am glad I didn't! It seems durable enough for my uses (to and from work.) I bought a battery pack to use in it and I can understand peoples frustration about the wire just hanging in there, it does get caught some times. I just glued a strip of fabric around the edge to keep the wire manageable. I do wish the manufacturer would have done this to begin with, but I'm not going to dock it for that since it was such a deal overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for college.
customer_reviews.text: Great for college. It holds just what I need it to and then some. I'm a CS college student so I carry a lot of tech on me from class to class and this pack is just perfect for it. It holds my laptop, my iPad, their chargers, pens pencils, a notepad, and my water bottle just perfectly and without killing my back. The included USB charging pass through is handy too. I wouldn't recommend using the included lock though. It's flimsy and just ins't worth locking and unlocking your pack every time you want to use it. If someone wants to steal something, they'll just steal your whole backpack. Great backpack overall!
customer_reviews.author: Holden

customer_reviews.title: Best backpack I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Got this backpack to house my 15.6" gaming laptop and works well. Fits all my accessories and gadgets perfectly and makes them well organized. Zipper feels quick and satisfying. Love the charging port for my phone and I use it often with my anker power bank which hides nicely out of the way. Side pockets work well to place my flashlight and knife and I like that I can snap my phone into place with the strap where the charge port comes out. It fits comfortably and tight on my shoulders and the modern design makes it appealing as I'm a major tech enthusiast. I would purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: canibeatStance

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality!! Purchased for my adult son. He bought one about 2017 and used it constantly!! He never carries a wallet so this backpack really helps. It locks so he feels his personal property is reasonably safe. As far as quality? CLASS A!! It has taken alot of abuse and lasted 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Allison

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase, great price!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a backpack that wasn't too big, that had space for his tablet/notebook, because the one he had was too bulky. I bought him the brown one for his birthday and he loves it. It's sleek and compact, but has room for everything. It was so nice that I bought myself a black one so I could use it for traveling, wear it while in uniform and it's padded for my 15" work laptop and plenty of storage space for other things. Lots of pockets in the larger sections. I haven't had mine for more than a couple days, so I'll have to update on durability and comfort, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: ashalee82

customer_reviews.title: A Dang Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: I get my money’s worth out of this. I’ve had it for over a year, use it almost daily and can commute to work or use it for a weekend trip. It’s super sturdy—no rips, tears, holes so far. The main pocket can get a little stuffed, especially with a laptop and charger in there, and it tends to be front-heavy and fall forward when I put it down. Not a huge deal though, and I love the color. Comfy to wear, too.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Voss

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for work and I haven't regretted it. It is a bit smaller than I thought, but the size is surprisingly perfect for me. The side pockets for water bottles are smaller; however lots of pockets, and space in the backpack makes up for it. I can't give a credible review on the water resistance. The last time it rained, I had an umbrella. However, the documents in my backpack didn't get wet under light rain. I am enjoying it so far. It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: AbiT

customer_reviews.title: Well Made; Good Value
customer_reviews.text: College Backpack: You guessed it...I bought this for my youngest son to take to college. It seems to be well made, with a padded back and a pocket specifically for the laptop, and separate pockets for other things, including one that seems to be sized for writing implements and another sized for a wallet. The straps over the shoulders are very well padded, as well. It is a midnight blue color, which is very nice. As I said, the quality seems to be good; I would not be surprised if it lasts my son for most, if not all, of college. It's not the cheapest backpack out there but it is a good value.
customer_reviews.author: Marjie, Mother of 9Top Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes ordering this product with such high reviews. However, when I received, it feels cheap. Like the kind of backpack you might be given for free at a baseball game or for signing up for a credit card cheap. Not enough inner pockets or dividers. I'm shocked with the 5 star rating this has. Update: after my first trip, I hate this bag. Waste of $30. Horrible design, not enough pockets. Save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a 10 day trip (because of the built-in USB charger) but when I got back home I just keep using it! It makes a great laptop bag, all the zippers and straps seem to be well made, it's lightweight but strong, and it fits in a pretty small/compact space. I found I rarely use the "portable USB port"... but I still love that it's there if I need it. I have more often found a need for the battery the I keep charged for that feature. I really like the style as well. I may purchase another just so i have when this one wears out... Overall? It's a winner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Still Shopping

customer_reviews.title: Short life span, not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was bought as my daily bag to take to work. It lasted 10 months before everything started falling apart.2 Zippers came off (very front pocket and inside main compartment pocket), stitching started coming apart. If you are looking for something to last less than a year this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Backpack itself is great but the charging port does not work
customer_reviews.text: Backpack design is great and lots of storage for its size but the charge port is broken. Which is really disappointing because its one of the main reasons I bought this. It only seems to work when i apply pressure to the port itself by squeezing it. As soon as i let go the charging stops. This tells me the line is bad and there is no way to fix or replace it without cutting up the material holding it all in. I hate sending things back but it looks like I will have to with this one. I really need that port to work.
customer_reviews.author: Sliph

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, nicely made, and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack. I use this as my backpack for work and it's super comfortable, fits everything I need, and I love the water resistance. I've had quite a few treks through pouring rain with this backpack and none of my stuff has ever gotten wet. Seems to be really well made too. It also comes with a nice little lock to keep your stuff safe. I have not tried the lock yet, so I can't say how well it works though. Overall, I would definitely recommend this and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect size to hold things, but not so huge that its obnoxious to tote around. The front slanted pocket is perfect for quick finds like my gloves/ID for work, and the inside pockets are what I use for my wallet/phone. The included lock is meh, but it didnt really matter as I had bag locks anyway. The material feels strong and well made, and the zippers caught my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Jaahnavi

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for a commuter backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect. I use it for my daily commute to work. I take public transportation daily. Holds just what I need and sits comfortably on my back and shoulders. It's not to bulky where it would knock into people like a larger bag would if I were to turn at all. Fits my surface pro and LED tablet like a glove. Ample space to carry other items also, like a sweater and other items too. I've not used a backpack in years. Glad I picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: HJ

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Backpack I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to start off by stating that I haven't utilized the charging capabilities yet. That being said, I have relied on this backpack for the last few months and I'm very happy with it. There's plenty of space inside, while the backpack itself remains fashionable and good-looking It's water resistant. I've been carrying it around through the spring and winter months, and there's been a lot precipitation, but all of my important papers and electronics have remained safe inside.
customer_reviews.author: S. M. Hortin

customer_reviews.title: Good Bag, but not for 15.6 computers
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag itself. My only problem is that my laptop (a 15.6 laptop) fits in super tight. Once I place the laptop in the bag, I have to pull at the top of the bag to get the bag over the corners of the laptop in order to zip it. I would think it would fit a smaller laptop perfectly, but since it is advertised as fitting the 15.6 laptop, I would think it would fit easily inside instead of being a problem every time I put the laptop in it. I am currently looking for a new bag that will actually fit my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: M. H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love this backpack. I use it for work and for traveling. Fits everything I need day to day. My 20oz Tervis water bottle fits perfectly in th side pocket and never falls out when I swing the backpack around to the front. The inside pockets are great quality and haven’t torn or frayed. I love the outside USB port for while I’m traveling so that I don’t have to have my portable charger in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Hailee

customer_reviews.title: Buy Your Own Lock-Great Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is good for transporting laptop and notebooks, but don't count on the lock that comes with it to work. It's a cheap and useless combo lock that would not open at all, in spite of following the instructions. The inside compartments are padded to protect electronic equipment. The adjustable shoulder straps seem secure, even with heavy loads. I only subtracted a star for the broken lock.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag to take my laptop and PS4 to a friend's house. It fits my 15.6 in laptop, mouse, mouse pad, and power block. It also fits the PS4, controller, and all associated cables. Still has room for a drink and other small things. Feels comfortable on my back even when full, and doesn't give any indication of falling apart. The included USB cable is a handy thing I didn't really expect to use much. I'll be using this as my carry-on in May and will report back if the bag fails to meet expectations, but I doubt it will.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Ok for commutes, not for travel
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks great, but there’s not a lot to it. Yes, it’s “cool” that it has a charging port, but the feature seems overrated. Form, fit and function of the interior seems to be lacking a lot for this bag to be great. Zippers also feel flimsy, but it is a low price point, so I gave the whole thing 4 stars. Needs more sectional pockets to be more functional for today’s world of mouse, keyboard, tablet, hard drive, adapters, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Weak, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is fine. It's not comfortable and can't hold a lot in it. I've had it for a while in attempt to like it along with everyone else, but I just don't. It feels like the bottoms going to break when I have my laptop and textbooks in it. Youre better off spending a little more on a better brand like North Face. Especially if your like me and carring around expensive valuables like your laptop. Wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Ward

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bag for work and play that could accommodate more than gym clothes or a laptop and charger. This bag was far better quality than I expected. The integrated USB port is fantastic for traveling or short hikes when you want to plug your phone in without carrying a battery pack in your hand. The pack is sturdy and comfortable. The interior pockets are adequate and well placed. I've even received a number of compliments on it. Simple and useful!
customer_reviews.author: ThatGuyJake

customer_reviews.title: Worth every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Used this for business travel overseas and it held up to 5 plane rides and about 100 miles on foot in 100+ degree temps. I like the water bottle holder on the side - nothing slide out. Plenty of pockets and everything is still operating just as purchased. I do not write reviews that often, but I had two business partners that commented on my bag - so I thought I would do all of you a favor and give this a thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice laptop backpack, no cons
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice looking, high quality laptop backpack. Some other reviewers complained there isn't padding at the bottom of the bag, mine has a considerable amount of padding on the bottom and zippers are high quality. There is a good number of compartments, it is visually attractive, straps are comfortable and stay at their configured length. Bottom line if you are looking for a backpack for a 15.4" or smaller laptop buy this, if you have an abnormally large 15.4 like a Predator you are going to need to get a backpack for a 17" backpack but that is your laptop's fault, not the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love-a This Backpack!
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is so comfortable! I was able to carry both my personal and work laptop in this bag and it didn't feel nearly as heavy as a normal backpack. So far it seems to be made of very good quality materials. I haven't used the external USB charger yet, but I thought that was an awesome addition! My laptop is a 15.6 and it fits perfectly! There is an internal strap to secure the laptop and that unfortunately doesn't fit, but its not a deal breaker. I definitely feel that my laptop is secure and protected. The lock definitely helps. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Waluigi, Number Wahn

customer_reviews.title: It is a real joy for myself to teach him the value of a ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves it he is a junior in high school, so its hard for me to get something he really likes.We always sit down together and look items up, read the reviews. It is a real joy for myself to teach him the value of a dollar and spend quality time together. I like the size of this it doesn't look like hes going on a Lewis & Clark expedition. It is large enough for his Chromebook tablet and his folders and a few books.Being the color that we got it goes with his style of attire. The zippers work great and move freely,which is where most backpacks fail.
customer_reviews.author: C. Zack

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect day bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack! I have searched for a long time for just the right backpack. I purchased a MaxEdition backpack for travel, a LC Prime sling bag for small carry items so I could be hands free. Still I needed a medium sized backpack for being on the go during the day. This is the perfect size. It is a high quality bag with very smooth quality zippers. There are also plenty of pockets. The easily adjustable straps fits all. I have had a problem in the past ordering backpacks that were too small. I am a rather large guy with broad shoulders and this bag fits perfectly. I really couldn't have asked for more!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size !
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag ! I wanted a smaller bag that would be easy to carry and not so bulky yet big enough to carry my books and MacBook. This bag fits the bill. Perfect size with just the right amount of compartments. The bag is stylish and the straps are very comfortable. The only small complaint is that the dividers inside are wrapped in a plastic type wrapper that makes a sounds like wrapping paper. hard to explain. The sound an feel of the dividers make it seem cheap but it's fine. I highly recommend this bag if your looking for a small bag that still fits what you need. It works perfectly for me.
customer_reviews.author: carmens kindle 3

customer_reviews.title: Crincaly lining material
customer_reviews.text: Good backpack just wish they didn't use such a crincaly loud material. Don't think this would bother most peaple but I'm pretty sensitive to sounds. Kind of sounds like those crincaly dog toys to me. Also could have a slightly larger side pocket I can only fit a thin 24 oz water bottle in the side pocket and that's a squeeze. Over all it's a good backpack just know that's a deal breaker for others. Havent tested out the charge thing yet but i will update if it proves to be faulty or inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Durable but a bit small for our needs.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag for my daughter. She really likes it. It's a bit smaller than we anticipated. She cant hold all school supplies necessary so we may need to purchase a different bag. We have yet to had the opportunity to test its waterproof capabilities and haven't used the charging port. Therefore, I cannot vouch for those featuresjust yet. The bag is very durable and esthetically pleasing. Very cute. Overall, we are please with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TBdrx

customer_reviews.title: Light and tight little backpack for work
customer_reviews.text: This backpack I bought primarily for work and professional purposes - carrying a 14" laptop, folders, and some hand sanitizer + tools. For this purpose it works really well. It's much thinner than it looks in the photos, and if you are broad-shouldered you could have a bit difficulty taking it off and on. It also does NOT stand up on its own (lack of rubber pads on bottom). Owned for almost a year and it's still going strong despite the thin framework - cheers
customer_reviews.author: Cyrone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a young teen
customer_reviews.text: My niece uses this for school and she loves it! Not too big for a middle schooler to carry all day and its held up quiet well. I was surprised to find the built-in usb cable so she can connect her phone to a power bank inside. (If she was allowed to have her phone at school)
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before buying and decided to purchase! I wanted to wait a couple months before reviewing and so far (4 months later) I’m still very happy with my bag. I have the gray bag. I bring my laptop every day with me and it is always in between the padded section which I love! It’s also comfy and there are so many compartments and zippers which is great! I would purchase again. So far so good!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mss

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant and amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had this backpack for 2 years and it is one of the best backpacks I've ever owned. It is so compact yet fits so much. I can have a laptop, books and 2 days worth of clothes in it. It is definitely waterproof. I've had beer spilled on it and nothing soaked through. The only disappointment was one strap suddenly broke after 2 years of wear. I contacted them and they speedily replied and sent me a new bag. That is what I call customer service. I was only without my backpack for a week. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love the back pack
customer_reviews.text: Love the back pack. But the part that you pull to make the back pack tighter or loser on your back. Slides on the right side as you wear it. Makes it very uncomfortable to wear. So I had to tie the string which then looks ghetto. Considering I payed almost 30 $ for the backpack. ....... This is.my second year in a row buying this back pack. My son is now going into 9th grade and requested it. It is stylish has enough compartments for organizing but not confusing. For as much ear and tear they put on their book bags their sturdy, comfortable and stylish. Happy book bag hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely a good backpack to save space
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a good backpack to save space. I've purchase this one after purchasing another brand that I won't say, the other one was a huge backpack, in this one I just shove every single thing that I had in the other one and man, everything fits perfect and the weight was incredibly different. I just don't feel that i have it like in the other one. Water Resistant? Well So far so good and where I am it's sunny in the morning and raining by the end of the day + I move everywhere on a motorcycle. Very recommended this backpack at the moment
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zelaya

customer_reviews.title: Love love love it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a chrome book and this bag. Hated the chrome book, LOVE this bag. Threw it in when I sold the CB to sweeten the turd sandwich, immediately regretted having done so after buying a real computer and once again for neither the first nor the last time utilized the “buy it again” feature. P.S. don’t forget to buy a power bank. They’re cheap anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Asher

customer_reviews.title: Met expectations; buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Backpack came well packaged. It seems built of quality materials, and fits my 15.6" laptop and Ipad III perfectly, along with all of their accessories. There are numerous smartly designed pockets, including a padded pocked for the laptop which securely holds and protects it. The carrying straps are adjustable, and the pack is comfortable to put on and walk with. Haven't looked too closely at the charging feature yet, but am impressed by this backpack... especially with the reasonable price. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: baldandbad

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: trust the reviews. That's what I did and I bought this and LOVE it. I use it for traveling on business trips and walking in/out the office. On some business trips, I chose to walk to the office and not take an Uber or taxi. Some walks were up to 1.5 miles. This backpack gave me support and did not cause any issues on these walks. Quite comfortable. I like all its pockets and compartments.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Kosztowny

customer_reviews.title: Great for office use and travel.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a really great purchase. It fits everything I need for work and school. My 17" HP laptop fits perfectly in the laptop sleeve and still has enough room for a couple of notebooks, power bank, and other essential items. I bought it for the traveling on airplanes during the holidays. It fit underneath the plane seats, and the external cable was instrumental in charging my phone while I walked. I never had to worry about waiting to use a charging station at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: The Vroom's

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BACKPACK!
customer_reviews.text: Almost a year later and it still looks and feels brand new. This backpack is great. It's sturdy, I wouldn't say it has much "stretch" But you can actually fit a lot in it. I use it for work and fit my laptop and several project folders as well as the charger and various other small office products and still have plenty of room. Definitely would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Tenorio

customer_reviews.title: Slim with no loss of space!
customer_reviews.text: I still get compliments on this backpack! I bought it for a work trip and have used it daily ever since-- it holds and separates my laptop, planner, and any docs and has so much space left for a pair of running shoes, makeup, wireless mouse, etc while still keeping a slim profile. And that's just one pocket! The side pockets are large enough for my work and personal phones, keys, and the front pocket is great for ID tags or DL when you're at the airport. I love this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mace

customer_reviews.title: Scam for $30
customer_reviews.text: This really should only be about $15 knowing what you're getting. I don't understand why they used such an outdated USB port off the side of the backpack. the idea is to put a portable battery in your backpack and connect it to the USB extension and plug your phone to the outdated USB and slip it in the side pocket. This makes charging EXTREMELY slow and a greater chance of your phone getting stolen. It's better to put the phone in with the portable charger. The overall feel of the backpack was cheap and much smaller than expected. Even as a high schooler i just barely got all my stuff to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Davy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color and durable material
customer_reviews.text: My daughter picked this out for her school backpack. It works well, but the width of the inside is not quite big enough for all her books. Fortunately many of her books are online, but it would work better if it was a little more expandable. Nevertheless, the material seems very durable. The only other complaint is that the pocket for the water bottle is not large enough or doesn't stretch for a large water bottle. The bottle can easily slide out as well. Overall, my daughter does like the backpack, though.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Good for traveling
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this backpack for college and used it for about 1 semester. Personally I didn’t feel that it functioned well for a college backpack but I can definitely see it working for traveling. The lock that it comes with probably won’t protect you from much other than somebody discreetly unzipping and taking stuff. It can fit a 15 in laptop just fin however and has plenty of room to store all your cords and cables. The USB part didn’t get much use however I can see how handy it could be. Overall it’s a pretty good backpack for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Deven

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel companion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a last minute trip and its just perfect. Tons of compartments (and in useful sizes), everything looks well made. Its lightweight and looks great as well. I really like the side buckles, used it to attach my travel pillow. 17inch laptop fits just fine. The shoulder straps are lightly padded as well.
customer_reviews.author: msjbean

customer_reviews.title: Less storage than expected and side pockets are lacking
customer_reviews.text: Would have thought this bag could hold more based on the pictures, but nope. You can fit a laptop, notebook, and some pens & charger, but anything else will overload this bag. Also, the side pockets are just useless, especially with everyone carrying around water flasks these days and not water bottles. Even a water bottle would be pretty snug in the small pocket. Wish they would have added another zipper for the middle compartment as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerclaw

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, college student approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these bags for my twins for college. They have been using them for about a month and said they are perfect for a college student. They fit their laptops perfectly and still can hold books. I am not sure about the water resistance of this bag as my girls always use an umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Mo White and her seven cubs

customer_reviews.title: Great size for travel
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag a lot. it has held up pretty well over the last year. The one thing I don't like is the shoulder straps don't stay tight so i find myself adjusting them often. Not a huge deal for the amount I use the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Janusz

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but not really water resistant, more like mist resistant
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars for 2 reasons. Wore it in a rainstorm from bldg to car so maybe 3 min in rain. Soaked the outer pocket which had my phone in it. Fortunatly, in a case facing in, so no damage to phone. Recipts in outer pocket were a total loss. Second, no lock came with my bag, yet it has it in the image. This might be ok if you went through a sprinkler or something, otherwise, you need to get a can of waterproofing and spray down the outside pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: SP BisbeeTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Excellent backpack for travel and everyday use!!
customer_reviews.text: While I have had the backpack for only a short time, it appears to have met all of my expectations. It is just the size I was looking for and fits comfortably on my back. I LOVE the external USB port!! The cable inside that is used to connect to your portable power source is quite long. This enable you to position the power source in more than one place. Very happy with this purchase!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M Harkavy

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: idk. Looks nice. Zippers and magnet buttons are awesome. But it's kind of loosey-goosey, The middle pocket is lacking strong organization design, my pens and charger and stuff sort of roll around in there. Also I don't think the charger port is in a good spot, like where is the battery supposed to sit in there? I can't get my laptop or book out the big pocket without FIGHTING the dang usb cord going to my power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Kckyle

customer_reviews.title: The perfect laptop backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. It's spacious, but lightweight and doesn't feel like I'm lugging a suitcase around. It's well made and very sturdy. It is designed specifically for laptops and laptop accessories but also has room for your iPad, phone, files, books, etc. Even has storage space and a cable for a charger. Really nice! And the price was very reasonable. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NRG

product_meta.title: Laptop Backpack, Business Water Resistant Laptops Backpack Gift for Men Women with Lock and USB Charging Port, Mancro Anti Theft College School Bookbag, Travel Computer Bag for 15.6 Inch Laptops,Grey
feature_bullets: [PERFECT SIZE & STORAGE SPACE] Waterproof business laptops backpack organize your items with 12+ Pockets. Laptop pocket fits 15.6 inch, 15 inch or 14 inch Macbook/Laptop. Convenient main pockets for iPad, charger, binders, books, clothes, ect. Inside pockets keep your wallet, phone. Front slanted pocket perfect for quick finds such as your ID for work, keys for open door, two side pockets for water bottle and compact umbrella make your items organized

[USB PORT DESIGN & LIFE-TIME ASSURANCE] The USB Charging durable laptop backpack with built in USB charger outside and built in charging cable inside, you can plug a mobile power hub into on the inside, then you just connect your usb cable to your waterproof laptop bookbag and plug in your device for easy charging. Life-time quality assurance from Mancro and friendly 24 hours customer service

[SAFETY & FREE YOUR HAND] This antitheft business travel laptop backpack comes with a LOCK so you never have to worry about someone stealing your laptop, ipad, file and anything value. A LUGGAGE STRAP allows backpack fit on luggage/suitcase, slide over the luggage upright handle tube for easier carrying. Durable metal zippers close and open smoothly, ensuring a long-lasting usage everyday

[COMFY & STURDY] The laptop backpack made from high quality polyester fabric shockproof with high density nylon lining for better TEAR and WATER RESISTANT and heavy duty laptop backpack for the City. Two "S" curve PADDED shoulder straps relieve the stress of shoulder, simple but comfortable back design offer your great back support, making your working, business and travelling more convenient wherever you go

[MULTIPURPOSE & SIZE] 20 x 12.2 x 5.7 Inch, perfect to throw under your seat on an airplane when you are traveling or on business trip. Suitable for back to school college, can be easily stored. Good choose for a business laptop backpack for men, work backpack for men, office work bag for men and women and laptop bag for men, also will be a good gifts for men, gifts for women, gifts for your husband or boyfriend and travelers
